div.h1: ARISE Schools empowers and supports its schools to meet the needs of the communities they serve and prepare each and every student for lifetime success.

div.class: image-block-outer-wrapper layout-caption-overlay-hover design-layout-inline combination-animation-none individual-animation-none individual-text-animation-none

div.p: Working at ARISE Schools offers a chance to make a difference in the lives of scholars and a highly competitive salary with excellent medical and retirement benefits.

ARISE Schools seeks individuals who accept no excuses, take responsibility for student growth, can lead classrooms, engage scholars, work collaboratively, and build strong relationships with students and adults.

div.class: image-block-outer-wrapper layout-caption-hidden design-layout-inline combination-animation-none individual-animation-none individual-text-animation-none

div.p: ARISE Schools is a New Orleans based network of high performing schools which includes ARISE Academy, founded in 2008 located in the Upper Ninth Ward, and Mildred Osborne Charter School, founded in 2013 located in the Kenilworth area.
ARISE Schools feature a rigorous, arts-integrated education focused on the whole child.

div.class: image-block-outer-wrapper layout-caption-overlay-hover design-layout-inline combination-animation-none individual-animation-none individual-text-animation-none

div.p: ARISE Schools relies on private donations and grants to provide its students with the experiences they deserve. Click below to find out how you can contribute.
ARISE Schools Board Meeting (Virtual) - April 28, 2020 @ 6 pm (see board section of website for access info)

div.class: image-block-outer-wrapper layout-caption-below design-layout-inline combination-animation-fade-in individual-animation-none individual-text-animation-none
image-block-outer-wrapper layout-caption-below design-layout-inline combination-animation-fade-in individual-animation-none individual-text-animation-none

p.strong: Call 1-855-4LA-KIDS (1-855-452-5437) toll free 24 hours a day, 365 days a year.
and turn into your school leader

p.a: ARISE Schools Community Eligibility Program (CEP) Press Release

div.p: Asbestos Management Plans for ARISE Academy and Mildred Osborne Charter School are available upon request at the front desk of each school.
